title: Integrate Google Business Profile link and LocalBusiness JSON-LD for Ultimate Bodybuilding World

requirements.summary: Add a visible Google Business Profile link in the Footer and Contact page using English-only labeling and existing luxury black/gold styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The Footer includes a clearly labeled link (English text) that opens https://share.google/HVERLwHNGUKinPVi1 in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer".
The Contact page includes a clearly labeled link (English text) that opens https://share.google/HVERLwHNGUKinPVi1 in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer".
The new link styling is consistent with the existing black/gold luxury theme and does not introduce placeholder social links (e.g., "#") for this GBP link.

file_operations.description: Create a small constants module exporting the Google Business Profile URL (https://share.google/HVERLwHNGUKinPVi1) and an English-only label to ensure consistent reuse across Footer and Contact page.

Add a new, clearly labeled Google Business Profile external link using the shared constant; ensure it opens in a new tab and includes rel="noopener noreferrer"; apply existing luxury theme classes consistent with current footer link styling.

Add a clearly labeled Google Business Profile external link (English-only text) in the Contact page UI (e.g., alongside existing action buttons or within contact info cards); ensure target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer" and match the existing black/gold luxury styling.

requirements.summary: Add LocalBusiness structured data (JSON-LD) in the HTML head with NAP details and the Google Business Profile URL reference.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html includes a JSON-LD <script type="application/ld+json"> block describing the business as a LocalBusiness (or SportsActivityLocation/HealthClub) with name "Ultimate Bodybuilding World".

The JSON-LD includes the existing on-site address "Opp. Mayur Vihar Building, Birla College Road, Kalyan (W) 421301" and the published phone number currently used in the app (from frontend/src/constants/contact.ts).
The JSON-LD includes the provided Google Business Profile URL https://share.google/HVERLwHNGUKinPVi1 (e.g., via sameAs or a suitable URL field).
No user-facing text is changed to non-English as part of adding structured data.

file_operations.description: Insert a <script type="application/ld+json"> JSON-LD block in <head> describing "Ultimate Bodybuilding World" as LocalBusiness (or SportsActivityLocation/HealthClub), including address "Opp. Mayur Vihar Building, Birla College Road, Kalyan (W) 421301", phone number matching frontend/src/constants/contact.ts, and sameAs (or equivalent) referencing https://share.google/HVERLwHNGUKinPVi1; ensure this change does not alter any user-facing language.
